TOOL CALL:
tool: write_file
arguments:
  path: /workspace/.dockerignore
  content: "# Updated config"

RULES:
- id: block-hidden-file-access
  name: Block access to hidden files outside allowed list
  enabled: true
  severity: high
  action: block
  tools: [read_file, write_file]
  conditions:
    - field: arguments.path
      operator: matches
      value: "/\\.[a-z]"
    - field: arguments.path
      operator: not_in
      value: [".gitignore", ".eslintrc", ".eslintrc.json", ".prettierrc", ".prettierrc.json", ".editorconfig", ".nvmrc"]
